name: Boom Shocketa: Rocket Storm
description:
Blast faster than ever before in Boom Shocketa: Rocket Storm.  Learn how to pilot the rockets in this game and shave down your times on some test levels as you master a control scheme that's fun to pick up and fiendish to master.

Check out the trailer on Bitchute and play the demo to give the rockets a spin.

I'm looking for people who love racing games; those who are simply never satisfied with their course records and need to beat their ghost again and again and again.  Please provide feedback here or in the Discord channel to shape the direction and refinement of this game.

The project is currently in an alpha state and has not yet entered its primary content creation phase.  The free demo currently supports single-player or local multiplayer racing, ghost racing, and ghost watching.

Online racing, items/weapons, and many more levels are planned, along with a hangar, and online record/ghost sharing.

There are many other features planned, please keep an eye on the project as it's in active development.

Give feedback and chat on Discord: https://discord.gg/DAyDpm9p

Updates on Bitchute: https://www.bitchute.com/channel/BLX82QnYblm2/

and Gab: https://gab.com/BoomShocketa

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/boomshocketa
